channel.title: .co.uk domain
channel.description: I saw a .co.uk domain [url=http://redstation.com]here[/url], but my dad said that I needed to host with it. Can someone see if I do need to host with that service, and if I do, can you provide me another service with the same prices?

item.title: .co.uk domain
item.dc:creator: @Pker2 Pker``
item.description:
@Pker2 wrote:

Funny thing is, he’s using a free host himself.

Read full topic

item.title: .co.uk domain
item.dc:creator: @Chris_GD Chris GD
item.description:
@Chris_GD wrote:

Notebook:

free site’s dont get you no where…except like little forums if your only going to have 5-10 people…

Sorry to say but free hosting site do get you something. I use a free hosting site, basically like a dedi, called 987host. This free hosting site has got me this in the past 3 days. ‘Most users ever online was 100, Today at 12:50 AM.’ So before you say something about free site think again.

item.title: .co.uk domain
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Pker``, post:11, topic:278716”][quote author=Notebook link=topic=367891.msg2786642#msg2786642 date=1242518867]

free site’s dont get you no where…except like little forums if your only going to have 5-10 people…

You fucking dipshit. Do you know understand when he says that the site only providers the DOMAIN? That free site does NOT offer free hosting/forum hosting. God, you’re fucking retarded.

one learn how to spell mate where you said “Do you know understand” i went like what the hell? lol its “Do you not understand” and i do but hmm its still “free” website so it wont get him anywhere :\ i only get paid websites cuz its a waste of time working with a non-paid site i got vb and ulmb + dedi so yah i know what im talking about and mate if you need to learn or go back to school go preschool and start over cuz you cant spell :\ lol! (not flaming just example and fixing your mistakes)

Nice flame by the way Treznax
[/quote]
Notebook, you’re so fucking stupid.

  1. ULMB is not a fucking DEDI you fucking dipshit.
  2. You’re not using a paid host, you’re using a free one you fat ass duck.
  3. Your vBulletin is nulled, so shut the fuck up. vBulletin isn’t even $140 you fucking idiot.

Get out you fucking twat, no-one wants your stupidity here.[/quote]
vBulletin sucks dick so why are you even arguing about it? just grow up and leave it
